message.content:
Step-by-step analysis:

1. Identify the target data type: int
2. Eliminate the declaration of the variable "g" and substitute every instance of it with the original data type "int".
3. Eliminate the declaration of the variable "i" and substitute every instance of it with the original data type "unsigned".
4. Update the return type of the function "fn2()" from "unsigned" to "int".
5. Eliminate the declaration of the array "r" and substitute every instance of it with the original data type "int".
6. Update the constant "0xC3L" to its original data type "int".


Final program:

```json
{
  "program": "\nint h_2 = 0x92A1D2CDL;\nstatic unsigned i = 0x06D7L;\nint fn2() {\n  for (;;) {\n    int r[5][9][5];\n    if (h_2)\n      return 0xC3L;\n    g = r[i][i][i];\n  }\n}\n\nint main() {\n  fn2();\n}\n"
}
```
